prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.
Character 1
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.
Character 2
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
Character 3
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
Character 4
Name: Adrian Andrews
Description: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Mask DeMasque
Description: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.
Character 7
Name: Luke Atmey
Description: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
Character 8
Name: Ron DeLite
Description: A young man who turned himself in as Mask DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
Character 9
Name: Desiree DeLite
Description: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
Character 10
Name: Larry Butz
Description: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
Character 11
Name: Godot
Description: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
Character 12
Name: Kane Bullard
Description: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.
Evidence 2
Name: Treasure Exhibit Poster
Description: A poster for the Treasures of Kurain exhibit. Click here for details.
Evidence 3
Name: Ami Fey's Golden Statue
Description: A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Is holding the Shichishito. A statue of the founder of the Kurain Channeling Technique. Moved the night of the crime. Carried into the basement warehouse the day of the crime. Moved again that night.
Evidence 4
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, it looks like a plain old pot. One of the treasures of Kurain Village. Supposedly priceless, but has no monetary value. Found in the office of Luke Atmey. Has pink splotches all over it. Found in Atmey's Office. Covered in pink splotches, but it's the genuine article. Broken and repaired by Adrian 2 weeks ago, then replaced in its box. Kept out of sight.
Evidence 5
Name: DeMasque's Calling Card
Description: Sent before a heist, the emblem is top-secret. [info] 

To the Security at Lordly Tailor.

I will be coming to purloin the most
priceless work of art on display in
your "Treasures of Kurain" exhibit.

Take good care of the speckled urn, won't you...?

Yours truly,
Mask DeMasque
Pearl:
Um, these cute little pink splotches... They said that it's paint... And that they were put on the urn recently!
Evidence 6
Name: Shichishito
Description: A ceremonial sword held in the hand of Ami Fey's statue. Wasn't bent before the crime. DeMasque knocked Atmey out during the crime w/ a blow to the back of the head.
Evidence 7
Name: Camera Data
Description: The warehouse camera went off at around 1 AM on the night of the crime.
Evidence 8
Name: Desirée's Letter
Description: Addressed to her husband Ron DeLite. Apparently contains something important.
Evidence 9
Name: Security Camera Photo
Description: Photo of storeroom entrance taken by the camera. Click here for details.
Evidence 10
Name: Blackmail Letter
Description: Written with a fountain pen. Found in Ron's room. [info] 

Blackmail Letter

If you don't want your true
identity revealed to the world,
come to KB security at 1:00 AM
on October 12th and bring
$50,000.

If you don't, I'll take that red diamond you received the other day instead. Found in Ron DeLite's room. Written by Bullard. Click here to read.
Evidence 11
Name: Ron's Wallet
Description: Found by Larry at his part-time security job's company building (night of the crime).
Evidence 12
Name: Key Card → CEO Office Key Card
Description: Found inside Ron's wallet. Apparently used for the building of his part-time job. Found in Ron's wallet. Opens the KB Security CEO's office. Leaves a record when used. Found in Ron's wallet. Used on October 12th, the night of the crime, at 1 AM.
Evidence 13
Name: Publicity Photo
Description: A shot of Mask DeMasque striking a pose. Click here for details.
Evidence 14
Name: DeMasque's Broach
Description: Found in the shadow of Ami Fey's statue. Looks like it was torn off of some clothing.
Evidence 15
Name: Kane's Autopsy Report
Description: Time of death: 10/12 at 1 AM. Cause: Cerebral hemorrhaging from blunt trauma to the head.
Evidence 16
Name: Newspaper Clipping
Description: An article on Mask DeMasque's first heist. [caption] The article is titled 'Stolen!? The Gem and the Thief.' An image of a blue jewel is shown. Mask DeMasque is standing and ruminating in an alley, back to the wall. Next to him is a guiard with a flashlight. There are some trash bags. About first heist. Guard in photo is Ron DeLite. Click here for details.
Evidence 17
Name: CEO Office Buzzer
Description: Connected to the basement Security Guard Office. There are no fingerprints on it.
Evidence 18
Name: Kane's List
Description: Found on a table at the crime scene. Click here for details.
Evidence 19
Name: Buzzer Record
Description: The buzzer went off once at 1:02 AM on October 12 in the CEO's office.
Evidence 20
Name: Ron's Testimony
Description: From DeMasque's 2nd heist on, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.
Evidence 21
Name: Urn Box
Description: A wooden box that had the Sacred Urn in it. Has pink paint stains on it.
Evidence 22
Name: Paint Marks
Description: Completely dry. The box of the Sacred Urn fits in the gap perfectly. When Adrian dropped the urn's box 2 weeks ago she also knocked over some paint.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: I first received the request from Lordly Tailor about 20 days ago.
Person: Atmey
Testimony 1
Testimony: The urn was placed in a box, and Zvarri! It was then sent to the warehouse.
Person: Atmey
Testimony 2
Testimony: Hence, I was actually unable to see the urn for myself until the day of the crime...
Person: Atmey
Testimony 3
Testimony: I knew it was an extremely valuable treasure, so I sent my card 10 days beforehand.
Person: Atmey
Testimony 4
Testimony: I then handled security by myself to ensure that my crime would go smoothly!
Person: Atmey
Testimony 5
Testimony: At last, I held the urn in my hands for the first time at 1 AM on October 12th.
Person: Atmey

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
response:
Alright, so I need to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. Let's start by going through each piece of evidence and testimony carefully to spot any inconsistencies.

First, let's look at the evidence provided:

1. **Evidence 5: DeMasque's Calling Card** - This is a calling card sent before a heist, with a message to the security at Lordly Tailor. It mentions that Mask DeMasque will steal the most priceless work of art, the speckled urn, and warns them to take care of it.

2. **Evidence 16: Newspaper Clipping** - This is an article about Mask DeMasque's first heist, which involved stealing a blue jewel. There's a photo where Mask DeMasque is standing in an alley, and the guard in the photo is identified as Ron DeLite.

3. **Evidence 10: Blackmail Letter** - Found in Ron's room, this letter is written by Bullard. It threatens to reveal Ron's true identity unless he pays $50,000 and mentions taking a red diamond if he doesn't comply.

4. **Evidence 12: Key Card (CEO Office Key Card)** - Found in Ron's wallet, this key card was used to access the KB Security CEO's office on October 12th at 1 AM.

5. **Evidence 20: Ron's Testimony** - Ron claims that starting from DeMasque's second heist, he was stealing as directed by blackmail letters.

Now, looking at the testimonies:

- **Testimony 5: Ron's Testimony** - Ron says that he received a blackmail letter starting from DeMasque's second heist, which aligns with Evidence 10 (Blackmail Letter) found in his room.

But wait, there's a potential contradiction here. Evidence 16 (Newspaper Clipping) shows that Ron DeLite was the guard in the photo during Mask DeMasque's first heist. This suggests that Ron was involved from the very beginning, not starting from the second heist as he claims in his testimony. 

So, the contradiction is between Ron's testimony (Testimony 5) and Evidence 16. Ron claims he started receiving blackmail letters from the second heist onward, but the newspaper clipping shows he was involved in the first heist, indicating that the blackmail must have started earlier or that his involvement was different than he claims.
</think>

{"evidence": 16, "testimony": 5}

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
response:
Alright, let's tackle this problem step by step. I'm presented with a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies from a mystery game, and I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. 

First, I'll start by understanding the scenario. The main characters involved are Phoenix Wright, Maya Fey, Adrian Andrews, Dick Gumshoe, Mask DeMasque, Luke Atmey, Ron DeLite, Desiree DeLite, Larry Butz, Godot, and Kane Bullard. The crime revolves around the theft of the Sacred Urn from the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit and the subsequent murder of Kane Bullard.

Looking at the testimonies, Luke Atmey is making several claims. Specifically, in Testimony 5, he states that Ron DeLite killed Kane Bullard because of a betrayal. He suggests that Bullard wrote a blackmail letter targeting Ron, which led to the tragic outcome.

Now, examining the evidence, Evidence 10 is a blackmail letter found in Ron's room. The letter, written by Bullard, demands $50,000 and threatens to take a red diamond if the money isn't paid. This directly ties Bullard to attempting to extort Ron, which could have led to the confrontation and murder.

However, Testimony 5 from Atmey claims that Ron killed Bullard due to Bullard's grudge against Ron for betrayal. But if Bullard was the one initiating the blackmail, it's more plausible that Ron might have killed Bullard in response to the threat, not because of a grudge. This creates a contradiction because the evidence supports the idea that Bullard was the aggressor, while the testimony suggests Ron was motivated by a grudge.

Therefore, the contradiction lies between the evidence showing Bullard's blackmail and the testimony suggesting Ron's motive was a grudge.
</think>

{"evidence": 10, "testimony": 5}
